SysFileGetTime (FUN)
SysFileGetTime (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION SysFileGetTime : RTS_IEC_RESULT
Get file time of the specified file.
A standard path will be added to the filename, if no path is specified.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
SysFileGetTime
RTS_IEC_RESULT
The runtime system error code (see CmpErrors.library)
Input
szFileName
STRING
File name. File name can contain an absolute or relative path to the file.
Path entries must be separated with a Slash (/)  and not with a Backslash (\)!
ptFileTime
POINTER TO
SYS_FILETIME
Pointer to get the file time results.
